TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Pasumaq, title = Pasumaq, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pasumaq} }

S.FORM: Pasumaq Itiniay i Shizi Cen no Pingtung ko Pasumaq a niyaro', 109 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 339 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 94% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 320 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 6% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 19 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 92%, Rukai 1%, Bunun 1%, Amis 1%, roma 1%.

Pasomaq Itiniay i Shizi Cen no Pingtong ko Pasomaq a niyaro', 109 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 339 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 94% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 320 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 6% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 19 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 92%, Rokai 1%, Bonon 1%, Amis 1%, roma 1%.
